item.description:
How often does a movie like this make it to the mainstream theaters? Let's see it!
An American Carol
Opened October 3, 2008 | Runtime:1 hr. 23 min.
PG-13
rude and irreverent content, and for language and brief drug material
A cynical, Anti-American “Hollywood” filmmaker sets out on a crusade to abolish the 4th of July holiday. He is visited by 3 ghosts who take him on a hilarious journey in an attempt to show him the true meaning of America.

At 7:15 PM we'll make our way up to the theater. If you arrive after that, just find us there. I'll send my cell # in an email to those who RSVP.

The movie showtime is 7:35 PM.

You can buy your ticket for the 7:35 showing on Fandango.com.

This event is cross-posted at the Boston Young Republicans Meetup Group.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet near the bottom of the escalator @ 7:15 pm.
item.name: A Republican movie meetup: "An American Carol"
